title.rendered: Rubber Coated Safety Work Gloves – 8 Pair Pack, Firm Grip, General Purpose, Repairing and Construction

content.rendered:
• 【 TOUGH WORK GLOVES 】 Utowels brand work gloves are 1.9 oz/per pair ( 53.9 gram/per pair ) meaning well made, long lasting for extra duty work, up to 3 times more durable than average leather work gloves
  • 【 EASY-CARE WASHABLE 】 Breathable strong nylon knit shell and flexible rubberized coating are machine or hand washable, fast drying and reusable
  • 【 COMFORT HOLD GRIP 】 Work gloves with non-slip natural latex coating has strong gripping power for working in wet, dry, icy watery environments
  • 【 PUNCTURE RESISTANT 】 Palm and finger coated work gloves provide flexible dexterity along with nail needle thorn proof and abrasion cut resistance
  • 【 MULTI APPLICATIONS 】 General purpose, assembly, car repair, warehouse logistics, home improvement, gardening yard work, cleaning and construction
  • 【 Textured Rubber Palm Coating 】Smooth, strong, liquid-resistant and excellent for gripping. The seamless knit shell provides a comfortable, tight fit and the elastic wrist keeps out dirt and debris while you work.

excerpt.rendered: Rubber Coated Safety Work Gloves – 8 Pair Pack, Firm Grip, General Purpose, Repairing and Construction, for Men and Women ( Size Large Fits Most, Blue )
